text: Crescenta Valley is a valley located in Los Angeles County, California. It is bordered by the San Fernando Valley and the San Gabriel Valley. The valley was inhabited by the Tongva. During the late 1700s and the early 1800s, the valley was a rural area under the control of Spanish and Mexican real estate. The first American would arrive and settle in the area in 1871. Cities that occupy the Crescenta Valley are Los Angeles, Glendale, and La Ca√±ada Flintridge. Category:Neighborhoods of Los Angeles Category:Valleys of California
title: Crescenta Valley
